aboutItems.title: Yeoman
aboutItems.description: I really love this tool, it helped me scaffold an AngularJS app very quickly, and with bower I can keep my dependencies up to date easily. Grunt is great for compiling my Sass files, testing and deploying my app.

aboutItems.title: AngularJS
aboutItems.description: The entire site was built on angular which really helps separating business and presentation logic. Content is loaded via services that pull local json files.

subItems.title: UI Bootstrap
subItems.description: The top navigation and the portfolio carousel are directives that replicate bootstrap counterpart's functionality.

aboutItems.title: Require-js
aboutItems.description: Always my tool of choice for AMD loading and minimising script tags on the main HTML page.

aboutItems.title: Bootstrap
aboutItems.description: Great css framework that  took care of all aesthetic aspects of the site. It also gave me the change to use Compass for easily reusable styles.

aboutItems.title: Processing
aboutItems.description: I created a simple sketch using processing and loaded the resulting pde externally via ProcessingJS.
